column1: There are duplicated readings with nearby BROADBOTTOM HAREWOOD LODGE, particularly from 1915 to the end of the record in 1922 when MOTTRAM MATLEYS FIELD stopped. Over the 8 year period 62 of the 96 readings are duplicated. There are some earlier duplications, perhaps coincidental, except 1909 and 1910 where there are 6 duplications out of 24 monthly readings. It is not clear which readings are correct.
Note: 10 May 1897, Gauge moved 125 yds E to Mottram Stn.
